title: Best Bits of the Week with Morgan & Special Guest Mike D!
itunes:title: Best Bits of the Week with Morgan & Special Guest Mike D!
description:
Mike D has been gone for a month so naturally, we had to catch up with him on life, love, and everything in between! Morgan and Mike D talk about their favorite Christmas movies, as well as Mike D’s Christmases in Mexico and this being the first Christmas he is a married man. Then they discuss his time in Costa Rica and some of the cool things he got to experience.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
